It already exists

If it already exists how do you get to it? I can see my son's purchased content, but no details on when or how many minecoins were used. He says something he purchased is missing. How can I verify this with no history to determine if coins are missing.

This is so important. My poor six year old just came to me in tears because he bought something with minecoins from inside a hosted game. I didn't even know that was possible. He doesn't know what he bought, I can't get a list of what he's bought recently, so he's down about ¬£5 of coins.

Hi 369238776611 - these suggestions are welcome here, there's no rule against them. We're sure that the rest of the community knows that when making these suggestions, there may be copyright issues, however, it is a good measure of interest to see what particular properties may be worth pursuing in the future! Thank you for your assistance, however, these sort of posts are not constructive to the discussion.
it won't load

I've successfully built the cobblestone generator.

If you're thinking about buying this pack though, please note that this differs significantly from the original skyblock.  The sand island is different.  The islands here are also supported with bedrock.  Some resources that were in the nether are now in the overworld.  The starting island is not within an ice biome.  And there isn't a list of achievements to obtain that correspond with the original listings.

I've been using this pack to build my own rpg world(in more of a Tamriel way; with how extensive the world will be) but i think itd be cool if there were Khajiit, Argonian, and Wood Elf skins for villagers(not including wandering trader since they don't move -_- ) in the game as well so theres more to work with and personally i feel as if the original strider skin would be more suitable since it reminds me of a two legged creature from Morrowind, other than that everything is pretty awesome especially how different skinned villagers can hold different occupations rather than just one based on their skins, hope you guys see this and consider my ideas :D
